de.fu_berlin.maniac.general

Class Mothership

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • de.fu_berlin.maniac.general.Mothership
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Mothership
extends java.lang.Thread
    Main control-class doing packet processing and calling the user strategy. All incoming packets go through this class. Depending on the type, Mothership will do whatever is necessary, i. e. calls your onReceiveAdvert() if an Advert-Packet for you comes in.
    Author:
    maniacchallenge

      • isForUser

        public boolean isForUser(Packet dg_pck)
                  throws java.net.UnknownHostException
        A advert is for the user if the data packet being advertised has not already been won by this node at some other auction and also if the advert is either from this nodes associated backbone OR any other node. (So that excludes advert from other backbones)
        Parameters:
        dg_pck -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.net.UnknownHostException

      • setStrategy

        public void setStrategy(ManiacStrategyInterface strat)
        Use this function to give Mothership your strategy. DO THIS BEFORE SENDING OR RECEIVING OR ANYTHING ELSE! (If you don't, the defaul strategy is used, and you don't want that...trust me, you don't.)
